General_Description: '''Pride of Place''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''If you sail back to the Island of [[Keos]], search for the marble [[Lion]]'s brother. He stands proud on the peninsula at [[Apollo's Refuge]]. You can find me on his back.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
